content:encoded:
Case Closed begins with The New Adventures Of Sherlock Holmes this week. We’ll hear The Eyes Of Mr. Leyton, which originally aired September 24, 1945.

(29:53) We end this week’s episode with The New Adventures Of Nero Wolfe and his story, The Case Of The Disappearing Diamonds. That story was first heard March 9, 1951.

Download CaseClosed701

Case Closed is made available for free thanks to your support. If you’re able to help, please visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
